So you grudgingly give her your passwords in exchange for her own, coming to terms with the fact that your former teacher was about to discover the illicit websites you visited and porn you consumed. Since she had driven your car to Town Hall earlier that day, she simply took it back once the day was over and she got through answering her e-mails. You, meanwhile, stand by awkwardly and receive anyone wanting to talk to the mayor, telling Sandra to hide each time.

With the day finally over, and you having told Sandra as much as she needed to know about your friends and family, you bid her goodbye. You only hope she, in exchange, told you enough about her own life to manage that evening. You find no plausible way to bring her home with you, so you would have to face her husband all by your lonesome.

The question is: How does your evening at Sandra's home, with her husband, go?

You come to face down on the pavement near a bus stop. Just beside you there lay a shattered cellphone and a purse.

Groaning quietly you wonder why your chest hurt so much. Rolling over onto your back you look up at the night sky wondering what had just happened. You had just been trying to call a friend when you blacked out. Sitting up you look around and wonder some more as to how you got all the way downtown in such a short time. Deciding to stand up you lean forward. It is only then that you noticed why your chest had hurt so much when lying face first. You seemed to have somehow gained a pair of breasts since you had last checked. Not only that but they were wrapped inside of a woman's jacket and seemed to have been paired up with a neat skirt holding a pair of shaven legs. On the tips of your legs a pair of heeled boots covered up what you were beginning to suspect were women's feet.

"What the he-" you begin, cutting yourself off at the sound of an all too familiar voice. Closing your eyes you hold back a scream and murmur, "Oh God, I'm Li Wan!"

~ * ~


You and Li Wan had been classmates since kindergarten. However, as time went on you had gained a bit of a childhood crush on her. When she had figured out she pummelled you. Not wanting to get her punished you tried to hide the bruises. From that day on, any time she found your gaze perhaps lingering seconds too long in her direction she would come at you with a beating and a threat if you thought to persist. Since she had graduated however, the two of you had not seen each-other much so you finally had a chance to develop a normal relationship with Alexi (or so you had thought at the time).

~ * ~


Now, after all this time, to find yourself in her body, you cringed at the beating your subconscious thought must be coming.

"Well Fuck," you murmured in Li's voice.

info.brief_description: You and someone you do not get along with swap places permanently.
info.description:
Your name is Jacob J. Jonesbury (19) and you have just graduated from high school and have been accepted to the local university. One day you and someone who you don't get along with swap bodies and must adapt to your new situations.

While the people you swap with may seem like total jerks, they are actually nice people who just dislike you for some reason.

Characters:
Lily Steam: Your next door neighbour (19), your rival in school for grades and continually tries to show you up at home. Will be attending the same university as you.

Barbara Wong: Your manager at the department store where you work (26), has denied all your promotion and transfer requests since you started working there.

Alexandra Pentworth: Ex-girlfriend (20), broke up with you for Lily's brother Tom (18).

Kelly Ben: Girl who live across town(15), her and her friends like to hang out at your work and give you a hard time.

Ashley A. Appleberry: Step-Sister (19), the two of you never get along and compete for your parent's attention.

Mary-Anne Walters: Cousin (18), treats you as though you are a useless & stupid kid.

Sandra Summerwood: Town mayor & your old Social Studies teacher (31), You are against her policies and have protested against some of them.

Regina Geer: The math teacher at your highschool (36), The first day you met you accidentally knocked her over while riding your bike, the two of you have been at odds with each-other ever since.

Basic Rules:
1. No personality changes
2. None of the people you swap with have any romantic interest in you
3. Only 1 swap ever occurs

Please don't have a large volume of sex scenes, try to focus on the trials and tribulations of living in the new body.
Also, try to have good grammar.

Please add and Enjoy!
info.pretty_title: From Rival to Self, a swap story
